name: server
description: Methods	Urls	Actions GET	api/tutorials	get all Tutorials GET	api/tutorials/:id	get Tutorial by id POST	api/tutorials	add new Tutorial PUT	api/tutorials/:id	update Tutorial by id DELETE	api/tutorials/:id	remove Tutorial by id DELETE	api/tutorials	remove all Tutorials GET	api/tutorials?title=[kw]	find all Tutorials which title contains 'kw'
